title: Add support for generating RGBD / RGBXYZ data

content.raw:
# Summary

The DepthCamera class currently only support generating depth data. We can extend it to support returning RGBD and RGBXYZ data.

# Motivation

Currently the RGBD camera sensor in ign-sensors uses a Camera and a DepthCamera to generate rgbd and point cloud data. This is inefficient because

* It needs to do 2 render and copy operations. 
* It is doing extra computation to recreate xyz values from depth \(d\) for point cloud generation. It should not have to do this since xyz data area already available in the DepthCamera shaders. In fact we’re converting xyz to d in the shaders in order to return depth data.
content.html:
Summary

The DepthCamera class currently only support generating depth data. We can extend it to support returning RGBD and RGBXYZ data.

Motivation

Currently the RGBD camera sensor in ign-sensors uses a Camera and a DepthCamera to generate rgbd and point cloud data. This is inefficient because

  • It needs to do 2 render and copy operations.
  • It is doing extra computation to recreate xyz values from depth (d) for point cloud generation. It should not have to do this since xyz data area already available in the DepthCamera shaders. In fact we’re converting xyz to d in the shaders in order to return depth data.
